revised_title: Alfred Edwin Howard Tutton: A Pioneering Crystallographer and Educator
tldr: Alfred Edwin Howard Tutton was a prominent crystallographer and educator who made significant contributions to the field of crystallography. He conducted extensive research on the effect of replacing one element with another in a series of related compounds, studying the crystal forms and physical properties of over 90 salts. Tutton also played a crucial role in the development of crystallography as a discipline and was a dedicated educator, inspiring future generations of scientists through his work and teachings.
